text.tspan: Share of adults who smoke in 2000 vs. 2018
The share of adults, aged 15 years and older, who smoke any tobacco product on a daily or non-daily basis.
Share of adults who smoke in 2018
Share of adults who smoke in 2000
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
